Windlord/Nightlight:

"Ok I'm watting him in base's door." said the hawk while he was 
walking towards the exit.

Nightligth looked to Aerotaur, "Termitron is outside, isn't it? if 
they find him what will happen with him?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "I'm sending The Hero to help you.  Aerotaur out."  He looks 

over to The 
> Hero.  "Go find Windlord and help him search for the tracking 
device with 
> Perplex."
